xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document. #set($class = $doc.getObject('RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurationManagerCode.RiskCategoryClass').xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName : $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end ---- {{html wiki="true"}} #set($xredirect = $xwiki.getDocument("RISCOSSPlatformRiskCategories.WebHome").getURL()) [[$services.localization.render("edit")>>$doc.getExternalURL("edit")]] | [[$services.localization.render("delete")>>$doc.getExternalURL("delete", "xredirect=${xredirect}")]] {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
